title: PSA to all junglers that don't know how much vision means.
body:
Tracking Knife, Sighstone, or keep your warding totem. You have 3 options. There's NO reason you shouldn't have at least ONE way of putting vision on the map and more importantly keeping it.

I say this because for some reason every jungler I get that's not me goes chilling or skirmish and then swaps to Sweeping Lens and goes "Warding's not my problem. Not like we need to be able to see where the enemy team is"
